judul.title: Communication and Signal Processing
judul.description: The Communication and Signal Processing Research Group focuses on research in the fields of communication and image signal processing for communication applications, statistical signal processing, wireless communication networks, and LoRa-based Internet of Things. Applications of this research include mmWave communication, 5G, LiDAR for autonomous vehicles, vehicular communication, dynamic spectrum access, and more.
